video.title: The Layover
video.synopsis: Traveler and chef Anthony Bourdain makes quick stops in American, Asian and European cities as he gets to know the people, their home and their food.

episodes.synopsis: Tony was bound to face a layover in his hometown of New York City, but it's the perfect opportunity to show off his own longtime favorites.
episodes.title: New York

episodes.synopsis: With only 24 hours to spend in Singapore, Tony sets out to discover the exotic city's diverse sights, sounds and flavors.
episodes.title: Singapore

episodes.synopsis: In the middle of summer, Anthony manages to find the magic of Hong Kong despite being overwhelmed with heat and smog.
episodes.title: Hong Kong

episodes.synopsis: A reunion with friends and a visit to the locals' favorite neighborhood spots are on Tony's agenda during a layover in Montreal.
episodes.title: Montreal

episodes.synopsis: Tony turns a Miami stop into his own episode of "Miami Vice," tooling around in a red convertible as he celebrates the city's Art Deco and hot bodies.
episodes.title: Miami

episodes.synopsis: On a layover in London, Tony is reunited with friends and fellow chefs Marco Pierre White and Ferguson Henderson and has a drink at a favorite pub.
episodes.title: London

episodes.synopsis: Given just 30 hours to explore the streets of Rome, Tony reveals the Eternal City's many faces and, of course, its many tastes.
episodes.title: Rome

episodes.synopsis: Anthony makes new friends and explores the many delights of Amsterdam beyond its trademark adults-only playground.
episodes.title: Amsterdam

episodes.synopsis: On a two-day layover in Los Angeles, Tony stays at Hollywood's famed Chateau Marmont and finds the sprawling city's choicest spots.
episodes.title: Los Angeles

episodes.synopsis: Tony reveals that San Francisco's reputation as a mecca for health nuts may be overstated, and that it's a great city for the meat-and-potatoes crowd.
episodes.title: San Francisco

episodes.synopsis: In São Paulo, Bourdain stays in a boat-shaped hotel, eats with friends at D.O.M., checks out street graffiti and samples nose-to-tail dining at Mocoto.
episodes.title: Sao Paulo

episodes.synopsis: Bourdain indulges in coffee at Le Pure Cafe, eats a huge shellfish tower at Le Dome, observes a bread baker and treats himself to a duck press.
episodes.title: Paris

episodes.synopsis: In Dublin, Bourdain discovers a food scene as noteworthy as its drinking scene -- from sweetbreads and lamb to a home-cooked bowl of pork stew.
episodes.title: Dublin

episodes.synopsis: In Atlanta, Bourdain cruises in a muscle car, shoots guns, eats the "10 o'clock burger" and ends his trip at the adult Clermont Lounge.
episodes.title: Atlanta

episodes.synopsis: Bourdain visits the world's second tallest building, discovers jade carved in the shape of pork and learns something important about bar fights.
episodes.title: Taipei

episodes.synopsis: In Seattle, Bourdain samples artisan cheese, travels above the city in a seaplane and tours the city's historical underground.
episodes.title: Seattle

episodes.synopsis: In Chicago, Bourdain cruises in a vintage car, downs a great hot dog, dines with friends and learns that no one in the city eats deep dish pizza.
episodes.title: Chicago

episodes.synopsis: Toronto holds surprises for Bourdain, including the best Mexican takeout in Canada, hand-cut fries with cheese curds and a peameal bacon sandwich.
episodes.title: Toronto

episodes.synopsis: Skipping the cheese steak, Bourdain samples Israeli cuisine, visits neighborhood bar Dirty Frank's and studies the Founding Fathers' food preferences.
episodes.title: Philadelphia

episodes.synopsis: Bourdain indulges in Charm City specialties like fresh crab and shrimp, Sazerac, and tacos from one of the nation's best food trucks.
episodes.title: New Orleans
